subject: Order #SSN5374 - I forgot to add the baseplate
description_text:
Hello Guys,

Happy new year!

I hope you are well.

I'm writing to check with you if you can assist me. Reviewing my order I
realised that by mistake, I forgot to add the baseplate.
I know that my order has been dispatched already, but I was wondering if
you could send me the base plate with the same price conditions as if I had
bought the whole set.

Thank you so much.

Kind Regards,
Rodrigo Lopes
rodrigoblopes@gmail.com
linkedin.com/in/rodrigoblopes

conversations.body_text: Hi Rodrigo Barros Lopes,     You can purchase the base plate separately using this link. Since it is shipped separately, the shipping cost calculation may differ, which can result in price differences when purchasing the base plate alone. Thank you for your understanding.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-pedal-pro-x-with-heel-plate?variant=50475339645242

Hello,

Thank you for the link.

I did the order #SSN6116 to get via Express shipping, but following the
track number I’m afraid I will not receive up to Friday (7 days for
delivery as mentioned in your site)

Also, I just received the second package from you containing the VAM Pro.

However the accessories are not here. No bolts, no nut, no wrench’s, no
cable clips. Nothing. So, there’s no way to attach in the pedals.

I must confess I’m disappointed.

I hope you can help me out with these issues.

Kind Regards,
Rodrigo Lopes
rodrigoblopes@gmail.com
linkedin.com/in/rodrigoblopes
